para.text: The Mayor shall, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.
The rules shall include standards for:
The transfer of funds to the Fund; and
The reimbursement of costs incurred by the Mayor in the collection, processing, accounting, or disbursement of the funds generated by the tax check-off.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 14-213, in the table of contents of this chapter, substituted “§ 47-4108.01. Special agents for the Office of Tax and Revenue.” for “§ 47-4108a. Special agents for the Office of Tax and Revenue.”
